content:
### Task Instructions ### 
 Your task is to read the following text and assign appropriate labels from the provided list. This is a multilabel classification task, so each text may have more than one relevant label. If no labels are appropriate, return `==NONE==`. Do not create new labels or modify the existing ones.
 Here are the labels texts can be given, and some indicative keywords associated with each label, in the format '<label>': <keyword 1, keyword 2, ...>: 
 ----------------------------------- 
 ### List of labels ### 
 {categories} 
 ----------------------------------- 
 ### Text to Classify ### 
 ``` 
 {text} 
 ```
